Channels DVR Server LXC

Channels DVR Server runs on your computer or NAS device at home. There's no cloud to worry about. Your tv shows and movies will always be available.

To create a new Proxmox VE Channels DVR Server LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/channels.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡

Channels DVR Server Interface: IP:8089
